script.line: Welcome to Pomegranate Village - a little town full of happy residents.
We now rejoin Prota, as she is scouring the village for her lost dog, Minty.
Earlier in the story, Prota got a little mixed up thanks to the Marble-izer 2000.
It'll be up to YOU to navigate the maze of her brain to trigger dialog choices.
Have fun and don't worry about making mistakes! They're part of what makes life interesting.
Morning, Prota! You look like you're in a hurryâ€¦
It's a long story. I'm looking for Minty, have you seen her around?
Fraid not. I've only ever seen her with you when you come in for lunch?
Her favorite sandwich! Maybe if I make her one, she'll come back to me!
Great idea. What does she like it on?
